title: Franchise-Tag-Deadline Recap and How to Spend Money in Free Agency
description:
Kevin and Nora are joined by Warren Sharp to recap the players who will be playing on the franchise tag next season, as well as the players who weren’t tagged and who will now be free agents this offseason (2:32). They then talk about Warren’s research into how teams have spent their money in free agency in recent years and how that has correlated to winning (45:07).

Hosts: Kevin Clark and Nora Princiotti
Guest: Warren Sharp
